Producer: Brian Duffield, Tim White, Trevor White, Allan Mandelbaum
Synopsis: "No One Will Save You" introduces Brynn Adams (Kaitlyn Dever), a creative and talented young woman whoâ€™s been alienated from her community. Lonely but ever hopeful, Brynn finds solace within the walls of the home where she grew up--until she's awakened one night by strange noises from decidedly unearthly intruders. What follows is an action-packed face-off between Brynn and a host of extraterrestrial beings who threaten her future while forcing her to deal with her past.
Title: No One Will Save You
